name: Mr. Steal Yo Wifi
description:
Momma turned off my wifi again! How will I download them tasty boobie pics now!
I guess I can go around the building and steal them wifi's of the neighbours again!

Sneak your way around the building to download pictures on your neighbour's wifi. Hide from their sight behind curtains, inside the shower or the closets, and whistle to distract them.

Controller:
Left Joystick: move and take elevator
A - Interact (to hide or take the elevator)
B - Whistle
X - Download picture (when you are in range of wifi signal)
Y - Dash forward

Keyboard:
Arrows keys: move and take elevator.
SPACE - Interact
E - Whistle
Left Ctrl - Download picture
Q - Dash forward

Made for the Global Game Jam 2018 by:
Julian Declercq: code
Miko Bielat: audio  -> soundcloud.com/micmacheartattack
Juda-Ben Gordier: art
Stan Loiseaux: art
Dave Van Verdegem: code
